scripts.all: concurrently "pnpm --filter @platform/main run dev" "pnpm --filter @platform/wf run dev" "pnpm --filter @platform/smm run dev" "pnpm --filter @platform/old run dev" "pnpm --filter @platform/asset run dev" "pnpm --filter @platform/study run dev" "pnpm --filter @platform/mdm run dev" "pnpm --filter @platform/labour run dev"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter @platform/main run build && pnpm --filter @platform/wf run build && pnpm --filter @platform/smm run build && pnpm --filter @platform/old run build && pnpm --filter @platform/asset run build && pnpm --filter @platform/study run build && pnpm --filter @platform/mdm run build && pnpm --filter @platform/labour run build
